snippet: The designer took a break from preparations for his spring/summer 2014 show, which takes place today, to talk about some of the larger passions that animate his work.
abstract: The designer took a break from preparations for his spring/summer 2014 show, which takes place today, to talk about some of the larger passions that animate his work.

headline.main: T Time | Jason Wu on Beauty, 'RuPaul's Drag Race' and the Unfashionable Allure of Las Vegas
